column2: Refund Workflow Tests - Complete UI-Based Test Cases

Test all possible scenarios for refund workflow of Condotel Management system end-to-end on Front-end UI, including user interactions, button clicks, form submissions, navigation flows, error messages display, and complete refund journeys visible on screen

column3: Failed
column4: Pending
column5: N/A

column3: Test Case Description
column4: Test Case Procedure
column5: Expected Results
column6: Pre-conditions

column1: Scenario A: Tenant Request Refund from Booking Detail (6 test cases)

column3: Cancel Booking and Request Refund - Valid Cancelled Booking
column4:
1. Open browser and login the system with Tenant role
2. Navigate to "Lịch sử đặt phòng" page (/my-bookings) by clicking on menu item
3. Click on a booking card with status "Pending" or "Confirmed"
4. Observe booking detail page appears
5. Scroll to find "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button
6. Click "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button
7. Observe confirmation dialog appears
8. Click "OK" in confirmation dialog
9. Observe page behavior after cancellation
10. If booking was cancelled within 2 days, observe confirmation dialog appears
11. Click "OK" to navigate to refund request page
12. Observe page navigation
column5:
1. Booking detail page displays booking information
2. "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button is visible and enabled for bookings with status "Pending" or "Confirmed"
3. Confirmation dialog appears with message: "Bạn có chắc chắn muốn hủy đặt phòng này? Nếu hủy trong vòng 2 ngày, bạn có thể yêu cầu hoàn tiền."
4. After clicking "OK", button text changes to "Đang hủy..."
5. If booking was cancelled within 2 days, second confirmation dialog appears: "Đã hủy đặt phòng thành công! Bạn có muốn điền thông tin để yêu cầu hoàn tiền ngay bây giờ không?"
6. After clicking "OK", user is redirected to refund request page (/request-refund/{bookingId})
7. Booking status badge changes to "Đã hủy" (red badge)
column6: Booking exists with status ""Pending"" or ""Confirmed""

column3: Request Refund Directly - Cancelled Booking
column4:
1. Open browser and login the system with Tenant role
2. Navigate to "Lịch sử đặt phòng" page (/my-bookings)
3. Click on a booking card with status "Cancelled" that was cancelled within 2 days
4. Observe booking detail page appears
5. Scroll to find "💰 Yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button
6. Click "💰 Yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button
7. Observe page navigation
column5:
1. Booking detail page displays booking information with status badge "Đã hủy" (red badge)
2. "💰 Yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button is visible and enabled
3. After clicking button, user is redirected to refund request page (/request-refund/{bookingId})
4. Refund request page displays booking information
column6: Booking exists with status ""Cancelled""
column7: booking was cancelled within 2 days from creation date

column3: Submit Refund Request - Valid Bank Information
column4:
1. On refund request page (/request-refund/{bookingId}), observe page content
2. Review "Thông tin Booking" card showing booking details
3. Scroll to "Thông tin Tài khoản Ngân hàng" form section
4. Review blue info box with text: "Vui lòng cung cấp thông tin tài khoản ngân hàng để Admin chuyển khoản hoàn tiền cho bạn. Thời gian xử lý: 1-3 ngày làm việc."
5. Select bank name from dropdown (e.g., "Vietcombank (VCB)")
6. Enter account number in "Số tài khoản" field
7. Enter account holder name in "Tên chủ tài khoản" field (uppercase, no accents)
8. Click "Gửi yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button
9. Observe button state and page behavior
column5:
1. Refund request page displays heading "Yêu cầu Hoàn tiền"
2. "Thông tin Booking" card shows: Condotel name, booking date, check-in/check-out dates, refund amount (red, bold)
3. Form displays three required fields: Bank name (dropdown), Account number, Account holder name
4. Account holder name field automatically converts to uppercase
5. When clicking "Gửi yêu cầu hoàn tiền", button text changes to "Đang xử lý..." with spinner icon
6. Button becomes disabled during processing
7. After successful submission, green success message appears: "Yêu cầu hoàn tiền đã được gửi thành công. Admin sẽ xử lý trong vòng 1-3 ngày làm việc."
8. Message shows: "Đang chuyển đến trang danh sách booking..."
9. After 2 seconds, user is automatically redirected to /my-bookings page
column6: Booking exists with status ""Cancelled""

column3: Submit Refund Request - Missing Bank Information
column4:
1. On refund request page (/request-refund/{bookingId}), observe form
2. Leave all fields empty
3. Click "Gửi yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button
4. Observe error message
column5:
1. Alert dialog appears with message: "Vui lòng điền đầy đủ thông tin ngân hàng"
2. Form remains on page, no navigation occurs
3. All form fields remain empty
column6: Booking exists with status ""Cancelled""

column3: Submit Refund Request - Booking Already Refunded
column4:
1. On refund request page (/request-refund/{bookingId}), fill in bank information
2. Select bank name, enter account number and account holder name
3. Click "Gửi yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button
4. Observe error message
column5:
1. Red error message appears in error box
2. Error message displays: "Booking has already been refunded."
3. Form remains on page, no navigation occurs
4. User can click "Quay lại danh sách booking" link to navigate back
column6: Booking exists with status ""Refunded"" and has completed refund request

column3: View Refund Request Page - Invalid Booking ID
column4:
1. Navigate directly to refund request page with invalid booking ID (/request-refund/99999)
2. Observe page content
column5:
1. Page displays error message: "Không tìm thấy thông tin booking"
2. Link "Quay lại danh sách booking" is visible
3. Clicking link navigates to /my-bookings page
column6: User is logged in as Tenant

column1: Scenario B: Tenant Cancel Booking (3 test cases)

column3: Cancel Booking - Pending Status
column4:
1. Navigate to booking detail page for booking with status "Pending"
2. Observe "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button is visible
3. Click "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button
4. Click "OK" in confirmation dialog
5. Observe booking status update
column5:
1. "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button is visible and enabled
2. Confirmation dialog appears
3. After confirmation, button text changes to "Đang hủy..."
4. Button becomes disabled during processing
5. After successful cancellation, booking status badge changes to "Đã hủy" (red badge)
6. "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button disappears
7. If cancelled within 2 days, "💰 Yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button appears
column6: Booking exists with status ""Pending""

column3: Cancel Booking - Confirmed Status
column4:
1. Navigate to booking detail page for booking with status "Confirmed"
2. Observe "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button is visible
3. Click "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button
4. Click "OK" in confirmation dialog
5. Observe booking status update
column5:
1. "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button is visible and enabled
2. Confirmation dialog appears
3. After confirmation, booking status badge changes to "Đã hủy" (red badge)
4. "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button disappears
5. If cancelled within 2 days, "💰 Yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button appears
column6: Booking exists with status ""Confirmed""

column3: Cancel Booking - Already Cancelled
column4:
1. Navigate to booking detail page for booking with status "Cancelled"
2. Observe button visibility
column5:
1. "❌ Hủy đặt phòng" button is NOT visible
2. If cancelled within 2 days, "💰 Yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button is visible
3. Booking status badge shows "Đã hủy" (red badge)
column6: Booking exists with status ""Cancelled""

column1: Scenario C: Admin View and Manage Refund Requests (8 test cases)

column3: View Refund Requests List - All Statuses
column4:
1. Open browser and login the system with Admin role
2. Navigate to "Quản lý Yêu cầu Hoàn tiền" page (/admin/refunds) by clicking on admin menu
3. Observe page content
4. Review table headers
5. Observe refund requests displayed in table
column5:
1. Page displays heading "Quản lý Yêu cầu Hoàn tiền"
2. Subheading shows: "Quản lý các yêu cầu hủy phòng và hoàn tiền từ khách hàng"
3. Search and filter toolbar is visible at top
4. Table displays with columns: "Mã Đơn", "Khách hàng", "Số tiền hoàn", "Thông tin nhận tiền", "Quét mã hoàn tiền", "Trạng thái", "Hành động"
5. Refund requests are displayed in table rows
6. Each row shows booking ID (format: BOOK-001), customer name, email, refund amount (red, bold), bank info, QR code (if pending), status badge, action buttons
column6: User is logged in as Admin
column7: at least one refund request exists in system

column3: Filter Refund Requests - By Status
column4:
1. On refund management page, locate "Trạng thái" dropdown filter
2. Click dropdown to see options
3. Select "⏳ Chưa hoàn tiền" option
4. Observe table updates
5. Select "✅ Đã hoàn tiền" option
6. Observe table updates
7. Select "Tất cả" option
8. Observe table updates
column5:
1. Status dropdown shows options: "Tất cả", "⏳ Chưa hoàn tiền", "✅ Đã hoàn tiền"
2. When selecting "⏳ Chưa hoàn tiền", table shows only requests with status "Pending"
3. Status badges show "⏳ Chưa hoàn tiền" (yellow badge)
4. When selecting "✅ Đã hoàn tiền", table shows only requests with status "Completed" or "Refunded"
5. Status badges show "✅ Đã hoàn tiền" (green badge)
6. When selecting "Tất cả", table shows all refund requests
7. Table updates automatically after selection
column6: User is logged in as Admin

column3: Search Refund Requests - By Booking ID
column4:
1. On refund management page, locate search input field
2. Enter booking ID (e.g., "BOOK-001" or "1") in search field
3. Observe table updates
4. Clear search field
5. Observe table updates
column5:
1. Search input field is visible with placeholder: "Mã đơn, tên khách hàng, email..."
2. After entering search term, table filters to show matching requests
3. Matching is done on booking ID, customer name, or email
4. After clearing search, table shows all requests again
5. Search has debounce (500ms delay)
column6: User is logged in as Admin

column3: View QR Code - Compact Size
column4:
1. On refund management page, locate a refund request with status "Pending" and bank info
2. Observe QR code thumbnail in "Quét mã hoàn tiền" column
3. Click on QR code thumbnail
4. Observe modal appears
column5:
1. QR code thumbnail (compact size) is visible in table cell
2. Thumbnail shows "🔍 Phóng to" text below QR code
3. When clicking thumbnail, modal appears with larger QR code
4. Modal displays: Title (customer name), QR code image (print size), refund amount, content text
5. "Đóng" button is visible at bottom of modal
6. Clicking "Đóng" closes modal
column6: User is logged in as Admin
column7: refund request exists with status ""Pending"" and bank info

column3: Process Auto Refund - Valid Request
column4:
1. On refund management page, locate a refund request with status "Pending"
2. Click "💰 Hoàn tự động" button
3. Observe modal appears
4. Review modal content
5. Optionally enter reason in textarea
6. Click "Hoàn tiền tự động" button in modal
7. Observe button state and page behavior
column5:
1. "💰 Hoàn tự động" button is visible and enabled for pending requests
2. Modal appears with title: "Hoàn tiền tự động?"
3. Modal shows description: "Bạn có muốn hoàn tiền tự động cho khách hàng qua Cas Transfer API? Hệ thống sẽ tự động chuyển tiền vào tài khoản ngân hàng của khách hàng."
4. Textarea for reason is visible with placeholder: "Nhập lý do hoàn tiền..."
5. "Hủy bỏ" and "Hoàn tiền tự động" buttons are visible
6. When clicking "Hoàn tiền tự động", button text changes to "Đang xử lý..."
7. Button becomes disabled during processing
8. After successful processing, alert appears: "Hoàn tiền tự động thành công!"
9. Modal closes automatically
10. Table refreshes to show updated status
column6: User is logged in as Admin

column3: Process Manual Refund - Valid Request
column4:
1. On refund management page, locate a refund request with status "Pending" and bank info
2. Click "✅ Xác nhận thủ công" button
3. Observe modal appears
4. Review modal content including QR code
5. Review bank information displayed
6. Click "Xác nhận ngay" button in modal
7. Observe button state and page behavior
column5:
1. "✅ Xác nhận thủ công" button is visible and enabled for pending requests
2. Modal appears with title: "Xác nhận đã chuyển khoản?"
3. Modal shows description: "Bạn xác nhận rằng đã chuyển tiền thành công cho khách hàng này qua ngân hàng? Hành động này sẽ cập nhật trạng thái đơn hàng thành \"Đã hoàn tiền\"."
4. QR code section displays: Customer name, refund amount (green, bold), bank name, account number, account holder name
5. Large QR code image (print size) is visible with text: "Quét mã QR để chuyển khoản"
6. If QR code is loading, spinner appears with text: "Đang tạo QR code..."
7. "Hủy bỏ" and "Xác nhận ngay" buttons are visible
8. When clicking "Xác nhận ngay", button text changes to "Đang xử lý..."
9. Button becomes disabled during processing
10. After successful processing, alert appears: "Đã xác nhận chuyển tiền thủ công thành công!"
11. Modal closes automatically
12. Table refreshes to show status changed to "✅ Đã hoàn tiền"
column6: User is logged in as Admin
column7: refund request exists with status ""Pending"" and bank info

column3: View Refund Request - Already Processed
column4:
1. On refund management page, locate a refund request with status "Completed" or "Refunded"
2. Observe action column content
column5:
1. Status badge shows "✅ Đã hoàn tiền" (green badge)
2. "💰 Hoàn tự động" and "✅ Xác nhận thủ công" buttons are NOT visible
3. Text "Đã xử lý xong" is displayed in action column (gray, italic)
4. QR code column shows "--" (gray, italic) instead of QR code
column6: User is logged in as Admin
column7: refund request exists with status ""Completed"" or ""Refunded""

column3: Filter Refund Requests - By Date Range
column4:
1. On refund management page, locate "Từ ngày" date picker
2. Select a start date
3. Locate "Đến ngày" date picker
4. Select an end date
5. Observe table updates
6. Click "Xóa bộ lọc" button
7. Observe table updates
column5:
1. "Từ ngày" and "Đến ngày" date pickers are visible
2. After selecting dates, table filters to show requests within date range
3. Table updates automatically
4. "Xóa bộ lọc" button is visible
5. After clicking "Xóa bộ lọc", all filters reset (search, status, dates)
6. Table shows all requests again
column6: User is logged in as Admin

column1: Scenario D: Refund Request Validation and Error Handling (6 test cases)

column3: Request Refund - Booking Not Paid to Host
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page for booking that has NOT been paid to host
2. Fill in bank information
3. Submit refund request
4. Observe success message
column5:
1. Form accepts bank information
2. After submission, success message appears
3. Refund request is created successfully
column6: Booking exists with status ""Cancelled""

column3: Request Refund - Booking Already Paid to Host
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page for booking that has been paid to host
2. Fill in bank information
3. Submit refund request
4. Observe error message
column5:
1. Red error message appears
2. Error message displays: "Cannot refund booking that has already been paid to host."
3. Form remains on page, no navigation occurs
column6: Booking exists with IsPaidToHost = true

column3: Request Refund - Confirmed Booking Too Close to Check-in
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page for booking with status "Confirmed"
2. Booking check-in date is less than 2 days away
3. Fill in bank information
4. Submit refund request
5. Observe error message
column5:
1. Red error message appears
2. Error message displays: "Refund is only available when cancelling at least 2 days before check-in."
3. Form remains on page, no navigation occurs
column6: Booking exists with status ""Confirmed""
column7: check-in date is less than 2 days away

column3: Request Refund - Completed Booking Too Long After Check-out
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page for booking with status "Completed"
2. Booking check-out date is more than 7 days ago
3. Fill in bank information
4. Submit refund request
5. Observe error message
column5:
1. Red error message appears
2. Error message displays: "Refund is only available within 7 days after check-out date."
3. Form remains on page, no navigation occurs
column6: Booking exists with status ""Completed""
column7: check-out date is more than 7 days ago

column3: Request Refund - Completed Booking Before Check-out
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page for booking with status "Completed"
2. Booking check-out date is in the future
3. Fill in bank information
4. Submit refund request
5. Observe error message
column5:
1. Red error message appears
2. Error message displays: "Cannot refund booking that has not completed yet."
3. Form remains on page, no navigation occurs
column6: Booking exists with status ""Completed""
column7: but check-out date is in the future

column3: Request Refund - Booking Cancelled Before Payment
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page for booking with status "Cancelled" and TotalPrice = 0 or null
2. Fill in bank information
3. Submit refund request
4. Observe error message
column5:
1. Red error message appears
2. Error message displays: "Cannot refund booking that was cancelled before payment. This booking was not paid."
3. Form remains on page, no navigation occurs
column6: Booking exists with status ""Cancelled""

column1: Scenario E: Refund Request Page UI Elements (4 test cases)

column3: View Refund Request Page - Booking Information Display
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page (/request-refund/{bookingId})
2. Observe "Thông tin Booking" card
3. Review all displayed information
column5:
1. Card heading shows "Thông tin Booking"
2. Card displays: Condotel name (or "Condotel #{bookingId}"), Booking date (formatted as DD/MM/YYYY), Check-in / Check-out dates (formatted as DD/MM/YYYY - DD/MM/YYYY), Refund amount (large, red, bold, formatted as currency VND)
3. All information is clearly visible and formatted correctly
column6: Booking exists with valid data

column3: View Refund Request Page - Bank Information Form
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page
2. Observe "Thông tin Tài khoản Ngân hàng" form section
3. Review form fields and labels
column5:
1. Form heading shows "Thông tin Tài khoản Ngân hàng"
2. Blue info box displays: "Vui lòng cung cấp thông tin tài khoản ngân hàng để Admin chuyển khoản hoàn tiền cho bạn. Thời gian xử lý: 1-3 ngày làm việc."
3. Bank name field: Dropdown with label "Tên Ngân hàng *", shows list of banks (Vietcombank, MBBank, Techcombank, etc.), helper text: "Nếu ngân hàng của bạn không có trong danh sách, vui lòng nhập mã ngân hàng (VD: VCB, MB, TCB...)"
4. Account number field: Text input with label "Số tài khoản *", placeholder: "Nhập số tài khoản...", only accepts numbers
5. Account holder field: Text input with label "Tên chủ tài khoản *", placeholder: "VIET HOA KHONG DAU (VD: NGUYEN VAN A)", automatically converts to uppercase, helper text: "Vui lòng nhập tên chủ tài khoản bằng chữ in hoa, không dấu"
6. All fields are marked as required with red asterisk (*)
column6: User is on refund request page

column3: View Refund Request Page - Action Buttons
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page
2. Observe action buttons at bottom of form
3. Review button states
column5:
1. Two buttons are visible: "Hủy" (secondary style) and "Gửi yêu cầu hoàn tiền" (primary style)
2. "Hủy" button is on the left, "Gửi yêu cầu hoàn tiền" is on the right
3. Both buttons are full width (flex-1)
4. "Gửi yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button is enabled when form is valid
5. Button becomes disabled when submitting or after success
6. "Hủy" button navigates to /my-bookings when clicked
column6: User is on refund request page

column3: View Refund Request Page - Policy Information
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page
2. Scroll to bottom of page
3. Observe policy information section
column5:
1. Gray info box is visible at bottom
2. Text displays: "Lưu ý: Vui lòng kiểm tra kỹ thông tin tài khoản trước khi gửi yêu cầu. Nếu thông tin sai, việc hoàn tiền có thể bị trì hoãn hoặc thất bại."
3. Text is styled in gray (text-gray-600)
column6: User is on refund request page

column1: Scenario F: Admin Refund Management UI Elements (5 test cases)

column3: View Admin Refund Page - Table Structure
column4:
1. Navigate to admin refund management page (/admin/refunds)
2. Observe table structure
3. Review column headers and content
column5:
1. Table has 7 columns: "Mã Đơn", "Khách hàng", "Số tiền hoàn", "Thông tin nhận tiền", "Quét mã hoàn tiền", "Trạng thái", "Hành động"
2. "Mã Đơn" column shows formatted booking ID (BOOK-001, BOOK-002, etc.)
3. "Khách hàng" column shows customer name (bold), email (smaller), cancel date if available
4. "Số tiền hoàn" column shows refund amount in red, bold, formatted as VND currency
5. "Thông tin nhận tiền" column shows bank name, account number, account holder (or "Chưa có thông tin" if missing)
6. "Quét mã hoàn tiền" column shows QR code thumbnail for pending requests (or "--" for completed)
7. "Trạng thái" column shows status badge (yellow for pending, green for completed)
8. "Hành động" column shows action buttons for pending requests (or "Đã xử lý xong" for completed)
column6: User is logged in as Admin

column3: View Admin Refund Page - Empty State
column4:
1. Navigate to admin refund management page
2. Apply filters that result in no matches
3. Observe empty state
column5:
1. Table shows empty state message
2. Empty state displays: Large search icon (🔍), Heading "Không tìm thấy kết quả phù hợp", Subheading "Hãy thử thay đổi bộ lọc hoặc từ khóa tìm kiếm"
3. Empty state is centered in table
column6: User is logged in as Admin
column7: no refund requests match current filters

column3: View Admin Refund Page - QR Code Modal
column4:
1. Click on QR code thumbnail in table
2. Observe modal appears
3. Review modal content
column5:
1. Modal appears with dark overlay (black, 70% opacity)
2. Modal content is centered on screen
3. Modal shows: Title (customer name), QR code image (large, print size), Refund amount (green, bold, formatted as VND), Content text (booking ID format: "Hoan tien BOOK-001"), "Đóng" button at bottom
4. Clicking outside modal or on "Đóng" button closes modal
5. Modal has smooth animation (fadeIn)
column6: User is logged in as Admin
column7: refund request exists with QR code

column3: View Admin Refund Page - Manual Refund Modal
column4:
1. Click "✅ Xác nhận thủ công" button
2. Observe modal appears
3. Review modal content including QR code section
column5:
1. Modal appears with title: "Xác nhận đã chuyển khoản?"
2. Modal shows description text
3. QR code section displays: Section heading "📱 QR Code chuyển khoản", Customer name, Refund amount (green, bold), Bank name, Account number, Account holder name, Large QR code image (print size, 264x264px), Helper text: "Quét mã QR để chuyển khoản"
4. If QR code is loading, spinner appears with text: "Đang tạo QR code..."
5. "Hủy bỏ" and "Xác nhận ngay" buttons are visible at bottom
6. Modal is scrollable if content is too long (max-height: 90vh)
column6: User is logged in as Admin
column7: refund request exists with bank info

column3: View Admin Refund Page - Auto Refund Modal
column4:
1. Click "💰 Hoàn tự động" button
2. Observe modal appears
3. Review modal content
column5:
1. Modal appears with title: "Hoàn tiền tự động?"
2. Modal shows description: "Bạn có muốn hoàn tiền tự động cho khách hàng qua Cas Transfer API? Hệ thống sẽ tự động chuyển tiền vào tài khoản ngân hàng của khách hàng."
3. Textarea for reason is visible with label "Lý do hoàn tiền (tùy chọn)" and placeholder "Nhập lý do hoàn tiền..."
4. "Hủy bỏ" and "Hoàn tiền tự động" buttons are visible at bottom
5. Modal does NOT show QR code section
6. Modal is scrollable if content is too long
column6: User is logged in as Admin
